Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Project a Sonic attack at the target.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。

Place a Reconnaissance Buoy on target hex, making all enemy units in a {HexRange} hex radius {EvasionDown}% easier to hit, for {Duration}[turn/]. The effect is reapplied at the start of each turn.[br/][br/]The buoy lasts for {DurationBuoy}[turn/] or until destroyed.[br/]
在目标单元格放置一个侦察航标，使 {HexRange} 个单元格范围内的所有敌方单位的命中难度降低 {EvasionDown}%，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。此效果在每个回合开始时都会再次生效。[br/][br/]航标持续 {DurationBuoy}[turn/] 或直到被摧毁为止。[br/]
Reconnaissance Buoy is a Shakarn Unit
At the start of each turn, all enemy units within {HexRange} hexes are {EvasionDown}% easier to hit for {Duration}[turn/]
每回合开始时，{HexRange} 个单元格范围内的所有敌方单位的命中难度降低 {EvasionDown}，持续 {Duration}[turn/]
Fire a combined Sonic Laser attack at the target.
向目标发动一次音波与激光混合攻击。
Deals -{KineticrDamage}[damagePhysical/] per each hex away from target.
与目标每隔一个单元格，造成 -{KineticrDamage}[damagePhysical/]。
Project a mix of damaging Sonic and Laser in a {HexRange} hex line.
对一条 {HexRange} 个单元格直线造成音波和激光混合伤害。
Project a Sonic attack at the target.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。
Copy the appearance and abilities from target enemy non-Hero unit for {Duration}[turn/].
复制敌方目标非英雄单位的外观和技能，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。
Holoshift can target Tier I and Tier II non-Mechanical units.
全息相形能够以 1 阶和 2 阶非机械单位为目标。
Holoshift can target Tier I and Tier II units.
全息相形能够以 1 阶和 2 阶单位为目标
Holoshift can target Tier I, Tier II and Tier III units.
全息相形能够以 1 阶、 2 阶和 3 阶单位为目标
Return this unit to its original form.
将此单位恢复到原始形态。

This unit is impersonating another.[br/]When this unit's [hp/] drops to 0, they automatically teleport up to a random position {ShiftbackHex} hexes away, reverts back to its orginal form and revives with {ShiftbackHP}[hp/].[br/][br/][firecol]A unit can only revive itself once per battle.[/firecol]
该单位正伪装成另一单位。[br/]当该单位的 [hp/] 降至 0 时，该单位将自动传送至最多 {ShiftbackHex} 个单元格外的随机位置，恢复到原始形态并复活，复活时拥有 {ShiftbackHP}[hp/]。[br/][br/][firecol]每个单位在每场战斗中只能复活自己一次。[/firecol]
Fire a combined Sonic Laser attack at the target.
向目标发动一次音波与激光混合攻击。

This unit can enter Deadly Overwatch, allowing it to automatically shoot at an enemy that moves or attacks within its field of view with +{CrticalAndAccUp}% critical chance and accuracy while in Overwatch.
此单位可进入致命警戒，使其在警戒模式下自动对视野范围内移动或攻击的敌人进行射击时增加 {CrticalAndAccUp}% 暴击率和准度。
Fire a perforating Sonic Laser attack at the target, dealing damage in a {HexRange} hex line.
对目标发动一次贯穿性的音波激光攻击，对一条 {HexRange} 个单元格直线造成伤害。
Project a Sonic attack at the target.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。
Project a ruinous Sonic attack at target location, in a {HexRange} hex range cone.
向目标位置发动一次毁灭性的音波攻击，对 {HexRange} 个单元格范围造成伤害。
Target friendly unit heals for {Heal}[hp/], has its negative Status Effects removed and gains {EvasionUp}% evasion for {Duration}[turn/].
目标友方单位治疗 {Heal}[hp/] 并驱散自身所有负面状态效果，同时获得 {EvasionUp}% 闪避，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。
When a Shakarn Broadcasting operation is active, this unit gains a battlefield wide effect depending on the broadcast.
当有蜥蜴人广播行动激活时，此单位会根据广播类型获得覆盖整个战场的效果。
Related to the [Type] Broadcasting Strategic Operations found in Shakarn_TechGroups
音波与激光混合近战攻击。
Fire a combined Sonic Laser attack at the target.
向目标发动一次音波与激光混合攻击。
Project a Sonic attack at the target.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。
Target non-Tactician friendly unit regains all action points.
目标友方单位恢复全部操作点数。
Target friendly unit heals for {Heal}[hp/] and has its negative Status Effects removed. The unit is pulled to a hex adjacent to this unit.
目标友方单位治疗 {Heal}[hp/] 并驱散自身所有负面状态效果，并且会被拉至一个与此单位相邻的单元格。
Target enemy Tier I or II Infantry unit reveals that one of its own was a Sleeper Agent all along, which appears under your control in an adjecent hex.
通过念出正确的触发暗语，潜伏特工将会苏醒。[br/]一个随机敌方 1 阶或 2 阶非无意识步兵单位转化成由你控制的潜伏特工。
Sleeper Agent is a Shakarn Unit
Project a Sonic attack at the target.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。
Fire a combined Sonic Laser attack at the target.
向目标发动一次音波与激光混合攻击。
Fire a combined Sonic Laser attack in a {HexRange} hex line.
对一条 {HexRange} 个单元格直线发动一次音波激光混合攻击。
Empower the next [abilityblue]Omni Beam[/abilityblue] to be a {HexLong} hex long and {HexWide} hex wide line.[br/]Unit enters [abilityblue]Defense Mode[/abilityblue].
强化下一次[abilityblue]全能光束[/abilityblue]，使其长度变为 {HexLong} 个单元格，宽度变为 {HexWide} 个单元格。[br/]单位进入[abilityblue]防御模式[/abilityblue]。
Attack is charged and will deal damage in a bigger area.
此次攻击经过充能，可对更大范围造成伤害。
All other friendly units gain a {DamageUp}% damage increase for {Duration}[turn/], per Action Point spent.[br/]Caps at {StackNumber} stacks.
所有友方单位每消耗一点操作点数，治疗 {Heal}[hp/] 并获得 {DamageUp}% 伤害提升，持续 {Duration}[turn/]回合。
该单位造成 {DamageIncrease}% 额外伤害。

This unit ends its turn and goes into a defensive mode. It grants itself and adjacent allies {DefenseModePsiTecShieldDefense}[shield/], as well as {ExtraEvasion}% evasion. Additionally this unit becomes {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} harder to hit and cannot be flanked.[br/]If this unit is staggered, the defensive mode is canceled.
该单位结束回合并进入防御模式，使自身和相邻友军获得 {DefenseModePsiTecShieldDefense}[shield/] 和 {ExtraEvasion}% 闪避。此外，该单位的命中难度增加 {DefensiveAccuracyTarget} 且无法被包抄。[br/]如果该单位被动摇，防御模式将被中止。
此单位获得 +{Shields}[shield/] 和 +{EvasionUp}% 闪避。
Project a Sonic attack at the target.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。

Units in a {HexRadius} hex radius have a {AnalysisChance}[strengthPhysical/] strength chance to gain [abilityred]Analyzed[/abilityred], reducing their resistances by {WeaknessAmount} for {Duration}[turn/]
{HexRadius} 个单元格范围内的单位有 {AnalysisChance}[strengthPhysical/] 力量几率获得[abilityred]透析[/abilityred]，使其抵抗降低 {WeaknessAmount}，持续 {Duration}[turn/]
Project a Sonic attack at the target.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。
Epimorphic relates to the regeneration of limbs, usually found on Lizards
When this unit takes damage from one or more enemy units or operations, it will regenerate {HPAmount}[hp/] at the start of the next turn.
当该单位受到一个或多个敌方单位或行动的伤害时，它将在下一回合开始时重新生成{HPAmount} [hp /]。
Project a Sonic attack at the target. On use, this unit gains a stack of [abilityblue]Ebb[/abilityblue], up to {MaxStackAmount} stacks.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。使用此技能时，该单位会获得一层[abilityblue]潮落[/abilityblue]，最多叠加 {MaxStackAmount} 层。
Flow abilities gain +{DamageIncrease}% damage and a radius increased of {HexRad} hex, per stack.[br/]Caps at {MaxStack} stacks.
每层潮落会使“音波潮涌”的伤害 +{DamageIncrease}% 且范围增加 {HexRad} 个单元格。[br/]最多叠加 {MaxStack} 层。
Project a Sonic attack at target enemy unit. [abilityblue]Ebb[/abiltyblue] stacks modify this ability.
对敌方目标单位发动一次音波攻击。叠加[abilityblue]潮落[/abiltyblue]可提升此技能的伤害和范围。
Each [abilityblue]Ebb[/abilityblue] consumed increases damage by {DamageIncrease}% and the hex radius by {HexRad}.
每叠加一层[abilityblue]潮落[/abilityblue]，此技能的伤害 +{DamageIncrease}% 并增加 {HexRad} 个单元格范围。使用此技能将消耗叠加的层数。
Fire an Assault Hasher SMG at the target.
使用哈舍尔突击冲锋枪攻击目标。
Deals -{ArcDamage}[damageWave/] per each hex away from target.
与目标每隔一个单元格，造成 -{ArcDamage}[damageWave/]。
Claw at a target with heated claws, setting the target hex on fire for {Duration}[turn/].
使用高温利爪攻击目标，使目标单元格燃烧，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。
Xeno as in relating to Alien wildlife
Unit gains +{Resistance} damage resistance to the last damage type it received.[br/]This effect lasts until the end of combat or until a different damage is dealt to the unit.
单位对上一次受到的伤害类型获得 +{Resistance} 伤害抵抗。[br/]此效果持续至战斗结束，或该单位受到另一种类型的伤害为止。

Unit gains [abilityblue]Detection[/abilityblue], +{SensorRange} Sensor Range and it's damaging abilities gain a {AnalysisChanceSingle}[strengthPhysical/] strength chance ({AnalysisChanceRepeating}[strengthPhysical/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Analyzed[/abilityred], reducing their resistances by {ResistanceDown} for {Duration}[turn/].

单位获得[abilityblue]侦察[/abilityblue]，增加 +{SensorRange} 传感器范围，且伤害型技能有 {AnalysisChanceSingle}[strengthPhysical/] 力量几率（多次攻击有 {AnalysisChanceRepeating}[strengthPhysical/] 力量几率）施加[abilityred]透析[/abilityred]，使其抵抗降低 {ResistanceDown}，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。
Throw an Impairing Grenade at an hex, dealing Sonic damage in a {HexRange} hex radius.
向一个单元格投掷一枚削弱手雷，对 {HexRange} 个单元格范围造成音波伤害。

Unit gains [abilityblue]Skitter[/abilityblue], making it {Evasion}% harder to hit for each hex moved during its last turn, as well as gaining [abilityblue]Water and River Camouflage[/abilityblue], making it undetectable when on water and river hexes.
单位获得[abilityblue]飞掠者[/abilityblue]，在上个回合每移动过一个单元格，命中难度就增加 {Evasion}%，并且获得[abilityblue]水域与河流伪装[/abilityblue]，使其在水域和河流单元格上时不会被侦察到。
This unit cannot be detected when standing on Water or River hexes.
该单位位于水域或河流单元格时不会被侦察到。
Unit is quickly repositioned to target hex. Then it gains +{ShieldAmount}[shield/] for {duration}[turn/].
单位迅速重新部署至目标单元格，随后获得[abilityblue]包抄者[/abilityblue]和 +{ShieldAmount}[shield/]，持续 {duration}[turn/]。
该单位获得 +{Shields}[shield/] 和[abilityblue]包抄者[/abilityblue]。
Unit gains +{CritChance}% critical chance, +{Accuracy}% accuracy and 1 level of [abilityblue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityblue].
单位获得 +{CritChance}% 暴击率、+%{Accuracy} 准度和 1 级[abilityblue]动摇抵抗[/abilityblue]。

Non-Mindless units that attack this one from within {HexRange} hexes have a {HallucinatingChance}[strengthPsyche/] strength chance of gaining [abilityred]Hallucinating[/abilityred] for {Duration}[turn/].
在 {HexRange} 个单元格范围内攻击此单位的非无意识单位有 {HallucinatingChance}[strengthPsyche/] 力量几率被[abilityred]致幻[/abilityred]，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。

Create cover at target hex. Adjacent non-mindless enemy units have a {HallucinationChance}[strengthPsyche/] to become [abilityred]Hallucinating[/abilityred] for {Duration}[turn/]. On resist, apply [abilityred]Broken Mind[/abilityred].
为目标友方单位制造掩体。相邻非无意识敌方单位有 {HallucinationChance}[strengthPsyche/] 几率被[abilityred]致幻[/abilityred]，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。

Unit gains [abilityblue]Resurgence[/abilityblue] until the end of combat and enters [abilityblue]Defense Mode[/abilityblue]. At the start of the next turn, this unit gains [abilityred]Insanity[/abilityred], attacking enemy units at random for {Duration}[turn/]. During this time, it also gains +{DamageIncrease}% damage increase and +{Resistance} resistance to all Damage Channels.

单位获得[abilityblue]复苏[/abilityblue]直至战斗结束，并进入[abilityblue]防御模式[/abilityblue]。下个回合开始时，该单位将获得[abilityred]错乱[/abilityred]并因而会随机攻击敌方单位，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。在此期间，该单位还会获得 +{DamageIncrease}% 伤害提升，并且对所有类型的伤害获得 +{Resistance} 抵抗。
This unit is [abilityred]Insane[/abilityred] attacking enemies at random. Unit also has +{DamageIncrease}% damage increase and +{Resistance} resistance to all Damage Channels.
此单位陷入[abilityred]错乱[/abilityred]，会随机攻击敌人。另外，单位获得 +%{DamageIncrease} 伤害提升，并且对 [damagePhysical/] 和 [damageThermal/] 伤害获得 +{Resistance} 抵抗。

This unit gains one level of [abilityblue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityblue].[br/]When this unit takes enemy damage, it gains a [abilityblue]Free Action Damaging ability[/abilityblue] of the same damage channel.[br/][br/]When used, it expires all abilities gained this way.
该单位获得 1 级[abilityblue]动摇抵抗[/abilityblue]。[br/]当此单位受到敌方伤害时，获得一个[abilityblue]免费行动伤害技能[/abilityblue]，可造成同等类型的伤害。[br/][br/]使用时，所有通过此方式获得的技能都将失效。
Cause an Explosion that deals damage in a {Hex} hex radius.
引起一阵爆炸，对 {Hex} 个单元格范围造成伤害。
Deal Biochemical damage to target unit.
对目标单位造成生化伤害。
Deal Arc damage to a unit. This effect jumps to {UnitJump} other units within {HexJump} hexes.
对一个单位造成电弧伤害，此效果将弹跳至 {HexJump} 个单元格范围内的 {UnitJump} 个其他单位。
Deal Laser damage in a {Hex} hex line.
对一条 {Hex} 个单元格直线造成激光伤害。
Deal Psionic damage to target unit.
对目标单位造成灵能伤害。
Deal Entropy damage to target unit.
对目标单位造成混沌伤害。
As in the Ebb from Ebb and Flow
Fire a Sonic attack at a target. On use, this unit gains a stack of [abilityblue]Ebb[/abilityblue], up to {MaxStackAmount} stacks.
对目标发动一次音波攻击。使用此技能时，该单位会获得一层[abilityblue]潮落[/abilityblue]，最多叠加 {MaxStackAmount} 层。
Fire a Sonic burst at a target. [abilityblue]Ebb[/abiltyblue] stacks modify this ability.
对目标发动一次音波冲击。叠加的[abilityblue]潮落[/abiltyblue]层数会对此技能效果产生影响。
As in the Flow from Ebb and Flow
全息相形单位不可以克隆自身。
Holoshift to the last unit into which this unit transformed.
全息相形为该单位上一次转变成的单位。
Unit recently transformed, and cannot do so until its next turn.
目标最近进行过转变，直到下一个回合开始时无法再次转变。
This unit's berserk protocol is being activated.
该单位的狂怒协议正在被激活。
This unit has -{StatusResistance} resistance against status effects due to its physiology.
由于其生理特性，该单位对状态效应具有-{StatusResistance}抵抗性

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

Extra Notes: Sono- relates to Sonic, all abilities that have a Sono- are Sonic abilities. Omni relates to abilities that combine Sonic and Laser damage. Omni abilities are Sonic Laser abilities. Holo refers to the use of Holograms
